thread.title: Comfortable boutique hotel in a great location
thread.title_full: Comfortable boutique hotel in a great location - Review of Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MAB430
title: Comfortable boutique hotel in a great location
text:
Stayed 3 nights on a business trip upgraded room which was relatively spacious and quite comfortable bed was outstanding. It's a smaller property, but service was great and all you'd expect in a boutique experience location is good, easy walk to underground, nice neighborhood and overall a very nice experience for a reasonable price which isn't easy to find in central London.
Room Tip: higher floor will have less noise See more room tips
